caption.p: The chemical structures of major hydrophobic compounds identified in P. frutescens: ( A) fatty acids; palmitic acid, stearic acid, lauric acid, oleic acid, linoleic acid, linolenic acid ( B) tocopherols; α-tocopherol, β-tocopherol, γ-tocopherol, δ-tocopherol and ( C) phytosterols; campesterol, stigmasterol, β-sitosterol, β-amyrin.
